titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the restraint of seruing of fee deere
Proclamations. 1624-05-02
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Theobalds, the second day of May, in the two and twentieth yeere of our reigne ..
Another state of STC 8724, with arms 13 at head (lacking the rose and thistle).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
